subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Mike Haywood, who was fired as Pittsburgh’s coach two and a half weeks after being hired from Miami of Ohio, has entered a court diversion program in Clay Township, Ind.
snippet: Mike Haywood, who was fired as Pittsburgh’s coach two and a half weeks after being hired from Miami of Ohio, has entered a court diversion program in Clay Township, Ind.
